name: jate
description: JATE -The Progressive Web Applications (PWA): Text Editor project is a web-based text editor designed to provide a fast, responsive, and user-friendly editing experience. It is built using the latest web technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, and can be installed as a standalone application on any device with a modern web browser

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run server" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js

author: Bryan A Quero
